Script: Start Game: Rules.rulescreen(~placeholder~); Rules.overworldbutton_name = ~Dice~; Rules.excludeenemies([~Mimic~[;]~Copycat~]); var diceranges = [~Halftone~|[1|1|1|6|6|6]|~San Fransisco~|[3|3|3|4|4|4]|~Cerulean~|[1|1|4|5|5|5]|~Havana~|[1|2|3|5|5|5]|~Beauty~|[1|2|3|3|6|6]|~Lucky Lou~|[2|2|3|3|5|6]|~Valley Girl~|[1|1|3|5|5|6]|~Freedom~|[2|3|3|4|4|5]|~Montreal~|[1|1|2|5|6|6]|~Celery~|[1|3|3|3|5|6]|~Trefoil~|[2|3|3|3|5|5]|~Jackpot~|[2|3|3|3|4|6]|~Gold Dust~|[1|3|3|4|4|6]|~Serenity~|[3|3|3|3|3|6]|~Rocket~|[2|2|3|4|4|6]|~Li Li~|[3|3|3|3|4|5]|~Promenade~|[1|2|4|4|5|5]|~Constance~|[1|3|3|4|5|5]|~Lumberjack~|[2|2|3|4|5|5]|~Pumpernickel~|[1|2|4|4|4|6]|~Citrus~|[1|1|3|4|6|6]|~Gogo~|[1|1|4|4|5|6]|~Old Bill~|[2|2|2|3|6|6]|~Delaware~|[2|2|2|5|5|5]|~Blossom~|[1|2|2|4|6|6]|~Shotput~|[1|2|2|5|5|6]|~Fido~|[2|2|2|4|5|6]|~Bournville~|[2|3|4|4|4|4]|~Lincoln~|[2|2|4|4|4|5]|~Paris~|[1|4|4|4|4|4]|~November~|[1|3|4|4|4|5]]; var randnum = [for(i in 0...(diceranges.length / 2) - 1) i * 2]; randnum = rand(randnum); var rangename = diceranges[randnum]; var rangearray = diceranges[randnum + 1]; Rules.dicerange = rangearray; Rules.rulescreen_text = [~h1~ + ~#~.substr(0|1) + ~Platonic Archetypes of Dice~|~~|~You currently have the following dice range:~|~~]; Rules.rulescreen_text[3] += ~[yellow]~ + rangename + ~[] (~ + rangearray[0] + ~[;] ~ + rangearray[1] + ~[;] ~ + rangearray[2] + ~[;] ~ + rangearray[3] + ~[;] ~ + rangearray[4] + ~[;] ~ + rangearray[5] + ~)~;
Script: Change Floor: if(getcurrentfloor() == 2){  var rewards1 = getcolumn(loaddata(~ncrmod/initialequipment/inventor~)[;] ~rewards1~); rewards1 = shuffle(rewards1); for(r in rewards1){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards1.remove(r); } leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] rewards1[;] 2); }

Description: Not only are the statuses all different[;]|but the generator is completely broken!
Rules Description: Status effects work differently.|All equipment[;] including starter gear[;] is randomized.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:~ + rand(getequipmentlist(null|[]|['excludefromrandomlists'|'robotonly'|'witchonly'|'alternateversion']))[;]~Equipment:~ + rand(getequipmentlist(null|[]|['excludefromrandomlists'|'robotonly'|'witchonly'|'alternateversion']))]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;]~Equipment:~ + rand(getequipmentlist(null|['small']|['excludefromrandomlists'|'robotonly'|'witchonly'|'alternateversion']))[;]~Copy~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
Script: Start Game: Rules.setalternate(~all~); Rules.excludeenemies(getcolumn(loaddata(~diceydungeons/excludedenemies~)[;] ~inventor5~)); var randeqa = rand(getequipmentlist(null|['large']|['excludefromrandomlists'|'robotonly'|'witchonly'|'alternateversion'])); var randeqb = rand(getequipmentlist(null|['small']|['excludefromrandomlists'|'robotonly'|'witchonly'|'alternateversion'])); var randeqc = rand(getequipmentlist(null|['small']|['excludefromrandomlists'|'robotonly'|'witchonly'|'alternateversion'])); while(randeqc == randeqb) { trace(~reshuffling randeqc~); randeqc = rand(getequipmentlist(null|['small']|['excludefromrandomlists'|'robotonly'|'witchonly'|'alternateversion'])); } giveequipment([randeqa|randeqb|randeqc]);

Description: Everything's back to normal again! Until you go down|a floor - the further you go into the dungeons[;] the more|the rules change...
Rules Description: Start with standard rules.|Gain bonus rules as you descend further.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: var rewards = loaddata(~diceydungeons/initialequipment/inventor~); chooseinitialequipment(getcolumn(rewards[;] ~init~));  leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;]rand(getcolumn(rewards[;] ~rewards2~))[;]~Copy~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
Script: Change Floor: if(getcurrentfloor() == 2){  var rewards1 = getcolumn(loaddata(~diceydungeons/initialequipment/inventor~)[;] ~rewards1~); rewards1 = shuffle(rewards1); for(r in rewards1){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards1.remove(r); } leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] rewards1[;] 2); }

Description: Go work your usual magic!
Rules Description: Standard Rules.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Burning Light~[;]~Spell:Electric Shock~[;] ~Spell:Ice Shard~[;] ~Spell:Sonic Wave~]| 2); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;]~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Doppeldice~[;]  ~Spell:Duplicate~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~ExtraDice~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]);

Description: A special treat: a random spell each turn! Yes[;] completely|random. Is that going to be an issue?
Rules Description: One spell slot contains a completely random spell each turn.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Burning Light~[;]~Spell:Electric Shock~[;] ~Spell:Ice Shard~[;] ~Spell:Sonic Wave~]| 2); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Doppeldice~[;]  ~Spell:Duplicate~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(6[;]  ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]);

Description: It's like magic - your first dice is always a 6! Your|next[;] 5. Then 4. Then 3. Look[;] you're a witch[;] I'm sure|you can handle it.
Rules Description: Your first dice roll is always a 6[;] the second a 5[;] etc.|Start with a [yellow]Bumpblade[].
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Burning Light~[;]~Spell:Electric Shock~[;] ~Spell:Ice Shard~[;] ~Spell:Sonic Wave~]| 2); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Doppeldice~[;]  ~Spell:Duplicate~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~ExtraDice~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]);

Description: You've got your usual equipment[;] usual health[;] everything.|It's a shame all your enemies have extra health and|upgraded weapons.
Rules Description: [100%]Enemies get 10% extra health.|[100%]All enemy equipment is upgraded.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Burning Light~[;]~Spell:Electric Shock~[;] ~Spell:Ice Shard~[;] ~Spell:Sonic Wave~]| 2); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Doppeldice~[;]  ~Spell:Duplicate~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~ExtraDice~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]);

Description: Woah[;] everything's different!
Rules Description: [100%]Enemies get 10% extra health.|Status effects work differently.|All of the equipment has been changed.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Sun Beam~[;]~Spell:Lucky 7~[;] ~Spell:Cold Snap~]| 2); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Magnifying Glass~[;]  ~Spell:Daffodil~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~ExtraDice~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]);

Description: Everything's back to normal again! Until you go down|a floor - the further you go into the dungeons[;] the more|the rules change...
Rules Description: Start with standard rules.|Gain bonus rules as you descend further.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: var rewards = loaddata(~diceydungeons/initialequipment/witch~); var rewards1 = getcolumn(rewards[;] ~rewards1_common~); rewards1.push(rand(getcolumn(rewards[;] ~rewards1_rare~))); rewards1 = shuffle(rewards1); chooseinitialequipment(getcolumn(rewards[;] ~init~)); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~ExtraDice~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] rewards1[;] 2);
Script: Change Floor: if(getcurrentfloor() == 2){ var rewards2 = getcolumn(loaddata(~diceydungeons/initialequipment/witch~)[;] ~rewards2~); rewards2 = shuffle(rewards2); for(r in rewards2){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards2.remove(r); } leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] rewards2[;] 2); }

Description: Dalalalalaaang[;] zoop zoop zoooop!|BOP[;] BOP[;] BOP!
Rules Description: Start with a gun.
Equipment: Zoop Zoop|Zoop Zoop|Zoop Zoop|Zoop Zoop|Bop Bop|Bop Bop|Bop Bop|Veneer|Veneer
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] loadtext(~ncrmod/jesterpacks/packs_ncr~)[;] 2); leveluprewards(3[;] ~Equipment:Smoke Signal~); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Call for Backup Warrior~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Witch~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Inventor~][;] 2); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Call for Backup Thief~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Robot~[;] ~Delete~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Equipment:Smoke Signal~);

Description: A straightforward adventure for a straightforward warrior.|But you're a jester so[;] uh...
Rules Description: Standard Rules.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Spiked Shield~[;]~Equipment:Boomerang~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shield Bash~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Script: Define Level Up Rewards: chooseinitialequipment(loadtext(~diceydungeons/initialequipment/jester~)); var subordupe = rand([~Equipment:Subdivide~[;] ~Equipment:Duplicate~]);leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] loadtext(~diceydungeons/jesterpacks/packs_bonusround~) [;] 2); leveluprewards(3[;] subordupe); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [rand([~Equipment:Call for Backup Warrior?~[;] ~Equipment:Call for Backup Warrior~])[;]rand([~Equipment:Call for Backup Witch?~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Witch~])[;]rand([~Equipment:Call for Backup Inventor?~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Inventor~])][;] 2); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [rand([~Equipment:Call for Backup Thief?~[;] ~Equipment:Call for Backup Thief~])[;]rand([~Equipment:Call for Backup Robot?~[;] ~Equipment:Call for Backup Robot~])[;] ~Delete~]); leveluprewards(6[;] subordupe);

Description: Team up with the other contestants and recruit the dungeon's|monsters in one final effort to overthrow Lady Luck!
Rules Description: Recuit enemies you defeat in combat.|Switch between contestants and enemies by choosing cards from a deck.|Equipment doesn't recharge between turns.
